website_summaries.verdict: A durable, powerhouse blender. Specs are similar to the Vitamix, although it's not quite as sturdy and robust.
pros: Large capacity and powerful, 3 HP motor
Exceptional build quality with extreme attention to detail

customer_reviews.title: Don't order this through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I've received two defective Blendtec blenders in a row from Amazon. The first one's motor didn't work at all, the second one (replaced the first one) burnt out after about three uses. Either amazon is shipping out all the defective ones, or Blendtec is selling the ones that failed quality control through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is worried
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender about tow month ago, the usage frequency is about one or twice a week. Today when i after blending a milkshake, a little black plastic chip leaking from bottom if the machine. I wondered what it was, and when i gentlly shaked the machine, i could hear the sound of some other dropped items inside the machine. So i opened the bottom cap with a screwdriver, excactly there were two more scrapes dropped from the bottom fan blakes. The quality is so worried even two months passed. I do request a replacement at least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is poor jar, used less 5 times the fruit juice ...
customer_reviews.text: this is poor jar,used less 5 times the fruit juice leaks from the bottom..
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Leaking water
customer_reviews.text: The Blendtec was broken when we received it. This was not from shipping but from the manufacturer. The gasket was leaking water like other reviews have mentioned. We returned to Amazon with no issues but are still disappointed. We are gonna go with Vitamix instead now. Wish Blendtec would fix their issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I purchased this price of crap blender on Feb
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased this price of crap blender on Feb. 6, 2018 and have already had to contact blend tech to have them send me TWO replacement jars before mid March!... The first jar the blade became loose and would NOT spin to chop vegetables and the second one the company sent had a leak at the bottom of the jar the FIRST time of useage. I am EXTREMLY disappointed because of all the hype behind this crap tech, I mean blend tech. Now I have to spend MORE MONEY because of the return window JUST so happen to close March 8th. I will NEVER purchase ANYTHING from the company Blend tech again. VITAMIX HERE I COME!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine & Kevin White

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Less than 350 uses, 3 years old the blade mechanism in the Jar ($100 to replace) locked up against the plastic during a blend, started smoking like crazy. Buttons on it aren't particularly reliable so had to unplug the machine to stop it from grinding. Scary when something with this kind of power starts to catch fire....Waste your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Straw

customer_reviews.title: Shredding plastic
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it 6 months and it’s shredding plastic into my smoothies :/
customer_reviews.author: Trayce Moore

customer_reviews.title: Died on me after a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender a couple of years ago, but rarely used it. However, for the past year I have used it once every day to make 1 protein shake in the morning. The shake is exactly 1 scoop of powder, 1 cup of water and 4 ice cubes. That's it. This morning it broke down. The motor seemed to be breaking down in some way for the past week and when I increased the power, liquid started leaking out from the bottom. Not a small amount either. For the money this thing should have lasted for longer than a year of daily use. Especially since I hardly put a strain on it with tough to grind ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B

customer_reviews.title: Refund.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn' work. It is terrible. It makes an error message- "overload" when I put only one banana into jar. I waste 1hr for this. Finally, I decide to refund. I really disappointed your quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Sinyoung Kim

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product
customer_reviews.text: The first blender I received wouldn't even run at all and this was a brand new one so I sent it back and got a replacement (also brand new) and it would barely run. It was very slow and didn't blend everything. The panel was not easy to understand without reading the manual and the manual was a generic for all Blendtec blenders not your specific one. I honestly can't support spending this kind of money for an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Blendtec Total Classic Original Blender 1 Year Later, 1 Month Later
customer_reviews.text: My Blendtec Total Classic Original Blender 1 year later is now operating at a noise level that is impossible to tolerate. The sound is especially unbearable when the setting is on ice cream or smoothies. This is most unfortunate because I have purchased two additional jars. There is an eight year warranty, so now I am tasked with trying to send it back, there is no way up in this situation!
customer_reviews.author: Chie Bukuro

customer_reviews.title: Overrated and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expected this to be the Mercedes of blenders. It had trouble doing frozen strawberries and ice. after being in storage for a few years I started using it again for smoothies and it broke within the year. I ended up buying a ninja at the grocery store that is ten times better. It blends ice and frozen berries with ease, and you can even cook hot soups with it. Don't waste your money on this blender. There is nothing that great about it that warrants the high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Darling

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT even work!!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable. Payed a lot of money for this blender and nobody could get it to work. First time we plugged it in we got the E-02 notification (Error!) So we did what the directions told us. Unplug it for 5min. Then replug it in. Run it without the jar on top (to make sure motor worked) It worked! Put the jar back on with some water inside it to try and blend. E-02!! (Error/ Overload) We wasted an hour to try and get this fancy smancy blender to work! All we wanted to do was to blend smoothies for our party. Lucky our Nutri bullet save the day!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Obenberger

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Treasure Truck!
customer_reviews.text: We often once already but Bought this for our daughter and son-in-law on an awesome price from the Amazon Truck. We love BlendTec (vs. Vitamix) because it's pre-set buttons take the guess work and remembering out and our favorite thing is it has NO SHARP BLADES! Our kids make their own smoothies and milk shakes and can clean it themselves without us worrying about them cutting themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Baxter

customer_reviews.title: package is not original
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. But the package box is not original manufacture box, and it's in shipping cardboard box. I bought a new product not refurbished , so I request Amazon to change a new one to me. Amazon customer service was good, but they replaced me exact same one without manufacture box. Since the blender works well, I don't bother to change. However, the package makes me think the product is refurbished not brand new.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing long term performance
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after a bit over 2 years of very little use, this machine became a hazard. As soon as it starts blending, the ENTIRE thing moves all overs the counter, shakes, makes a horrible noise, etc. If you don’t hold it down it WILL fall. I am trying to contact Blendtec for a refund or replacement, will update this when I hear back. PS: I did love this blender while it lasted. Wouldn’t recommend for constant use though.
customer_reviews.author: Fiamma

customer_reviews.title: This particular model is GARBAGE. Avoid it.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Right out of the box, if didn’t even turn on. All I get is an overload error. OVERLOAD !!!!!!! Come on guys! I’ve had a Blendtec before and it was the best blender I ever had for 4 years straight of heavy use. Burnt it out. But this was a surprise and Extreme disappointment. @Blendtec FIRE your QA dept. they suck.
customer_reviews.author: Akira

customer_reviews.title: This is a great blender
customer_reviews.text: If you can't afford a Vitamix, get this one instead...you'll love it and still be in the same blending circle with the Vitamix. They both do awesome, professional blending (unlike the Ninja, which is OK until you can get this or the Vitamix). Clean up is a breeze with this. Downside - accessory blender jars are expensive. Know which ones you want first, and save for the others later. Don't get too caught up in the blender wars - get this one and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Guy

customer_reviews.title: THE. BEST. BLENDER.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, THE. BEST. BLENDER. My wife would tell me about the Blendtec and how supossedly great it was. I was skepitcal. Then, we found it on sale during Cyber Monday and decided to take the plunge. It is well worth the price whether on sale or not. It makes creamy smoothies and blends to a level that I have no experienced with my traditional kitchen blender or my other mini-health smoothie blenders. I would buy again, and will buy a replacement if one is ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Petrosky

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this five years ago, and it's still going strong. It blends perfectly every time. In order for it to blend well, you have to pay attention to the order you put things in. It makes a difference! View the recipes by Blentec as a guide. I am just now going to replace the jar, after five years because it has become cloudy. I probably caused that from grinding coffee or leaving liquid in it too long. However, I've used it almost daily for almost five years and I'd say that I have gotten my money's worth. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: long time shopper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE The Blendtec and its Accessories!
customer_reviews.text: I've had and used the this Blendtec for over a year now. It has over 600 uses(the count doesn't change when you use the pulse feature) and still going strong. I put 1 to 2 cups of spinach in my protein shake every morning and the texture is always silkie smooth after blending. Yes, it is noisy but no more than other blenders. My Blendtec came with the FourSide Jar and I purchased the Mini WildSide Jar, Twist Jar and Go Cup. I've used my Blendtec to make shakes, almond butter, peanut butter, ice cream, almond milk, hummus, and soups.
customer_reviews.author: 7smalltikes4Him

customer_reviews.title: Best blender on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying this blender. I wanted to buy the blender for many years but the price was so high. I loved watching the YouTube videos of 'Will it blend?' In my opinion this is the best blender on the market. The blades are not sharp so it is safe and easy to clean. It is incredible that the blades are not sharp yet it will blend through anything. My only disappointment so far after owning it for well over a year is the container has stained light red from blending red chili peppers to make a sauce. I have purchased 2.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: It has started to have what sounds like a bearing problem with it rendering it unusable in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender about 5 years ago. It has about 466 cycles on it. It has started to have what sounds like a bearing problem with it rendering it unusable in its current condition. I was surprised to have a problem with this unit that I paid around $400 for. I did have a jar failure around a year ago and Blendtec to their credit did replace it. I did submit another claim for the motor problem and will have to wait to see how that go's. If the problem is solved in a reasonable way I will correct my review. I do truly hope they fix it because we really like this blender.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Fourside Jar poor quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine in April of 2011. 3 years later, had to replace the Jar (@ $100.00). And now, I have to replace the Jar yet again. Where the Jar attaches to the base, is just simply poor engineering!! I am sure I can sell the base on eBay to recoup some of my $399 I spent on it!!! Update: After reading some comments, I realized that the Jar may have been under warranty all along. I had no idea. Everything I searched for, made me believe that it wasn't. I contacted Blendtec, gave them my information on my Blendtec, and voila ... I will be receiving my new Jar in 7-10 business days!! Now that's customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos M. Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blender!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this blender! This thing does it all! I wish I had bought this years ago. I almost bought a vitamix but decided to take a chance on this. I’m so glad I did. And this review pertains to the Blendtec Total Classic. I know most reviews that you read on Amazon are not even associated with the product you are reading the review on.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: its keep saying OVERLOAD! Called Blendtec, they said its the defect oneand did not apologize for it. They sounded like its obvious that its defect. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Anh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service - great product
customer_reviews.text: Anyone deciding between these high end blender brands, definitely - go for Blendtec. We ve had our blender for over 2 years. We smelt burning one time we used it, and thought the motor had gone out but I called customer services, got straight through (and not to someone in a far land that doesn't understand English), they trouble shot the unit, found out the jar was defective, and they replaced it free of charge within a week. NOW THAT IS CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Cheryl Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be tricked into thinking older brand names are best
customer_reviews.text: Most wonderful blender I have ever owned after years of using the loudest blender which I believed to be the best Blendtec is a true blessing makes the best smoothies with much less sound does everything you need ThankYou treasure truck
customer_reviews.author: Alayna

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Blendtec, enough said
customer_reviews.text: Love this Blendtec blender. I have yet to find anything it can’t do. If all you make is smoothies, you are missing out on many other possibilities. I routinely prepare piping hot soups, make butter, grind flour from wheat berries, make hummus and whole juices. My kitchen is small, but this blender does not take up much room. I previously had an old Vitamix that was bigger and also much heavier. This Blendtec can do everything the Vitamix could and is much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Magicweaver

customer_reviews.title: While the unit has a good warranty the electronics will not outlast the motor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my blender in May 2010 and it finally broke. The control buttons died one at a time in the space of a month. Called cust service only to find out the warranty is from the day of manufacture instead of the date of purchase. I was then informed that the blender could not be repaired, it would cost as much as a new one and they did not sell the electronics board. Sadly the electronics seem to be the weak spot of this blender and this will not be the last blender you will ever buy. May the recycling gods be good to it because I won't.
customer_reviews.author: Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Worst customer service of blendtec
customer_reviews.text: I bought it long time ago, but to be honest, I only use a few times. But last week, it just not working. And I contact amazon first, since it is not in the return window, so they suggest me to contact the blendtec. I tried next day, but they told me they cannot do anything for my case. Anyway, I don't want to waste time on this.
customer_reviews.author: Melo Omelly

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Blender keeps saying Overload. Worked twice. I feel amazon is starting to use shady distributors. Their products (mostly electronic) are getting worse and worse. We have returned about 5 things in about 2 years because they didn’t work. Frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: B Rad

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a Vitamix but still does the job with just a little more effort.
customer_reviews.text: I find myself often having to press the buttons again to fully blend some of the things, so I’m not sure how the company came up with the times for the various buttons (i.e, one for smoothies doesn’t completely blend all of the frozen fruit into a smooth consistency). So far a good motor that hasn’t quit. Solidly built metal base. I clean it by putting some soap and warm water and pulsing it for 11 seconds on the base as instructed, but after about 200 uses, there is a film that doesn’t come off around the blade area.
customer_reviews.author: MAI NGUYEN

customer_reviews.title: Not as able to handle a bunch of frozen stuff as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I tried blending frozen fruit. My old ninja blender handles it great but this one only has the blade at the bottom and as a result it could not handle what I put in it, it just got stuck. For the price I was expecting it to be amazing, so I was a little disappointed. I ended up returning it and buying a ninja blender instead for a lot less money.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Did even start. Took it out of the box ...
customer_reviews.text: Did even start. Took it out of the box and plugged it in and powered it on and the display kept saying “error ......”
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Your best blender investment.
customer_reviews.text: Simply the BEST!! I did my fare share of different other blenders - from cheap to expensive. USELESS! I am proud that this blender is made in the U.S., and it's designed with functionality and durability in mind. It's also cute, doesn't take space on the counter and can change your life by providing you with the opportunity to make healthy and delicious shakes, and meals every day. Think of this product as your best investment and reward.
customer_reviews.author: IK

customer_reviews.title: Very good bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Pre-set settings that corresponds with what we need to do, super easy to clean, good all around quality in all the components. For the price this has the most poweful motor at 1500+Watts. The only thing that is a little uncertain is the warranty period. The owners manual makes no mention of a time period and the seller mentioned a 7 year warranty. I will look into this with the seller to see if they can send me a confirmation.
customer_reviews.author: NICOLAS D.

customer_reviews.title: Love this blender
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas. I ended up taking it because I use it more than he does. It is a gem! I use it every morning for smoothies. Yes, it’s loud but you cannot expect it to not be loud. The results of my smoothies are awesome. They are smooth and always consistent. I also have a ninja blender with the three tier blade. The blend Tec certainly puts it to shame. Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Parmesan rinds will not blend
customer_reviews.text: 8 years and 8 months and less than 1000 blends later, blending down parmesan rinds cracked one of the corners of the jar. Now it leaks. Replacement jars are $100+. Generally, I would not recommend this over a Vitamix, which has an analog knob which I find much easier for controlling. Blend settings are nice, but I wouldn't say better.
customer_reviews.author: G. Chu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blender
customer_reviews.text: I did not think I would spend 200 on a blender but this is an awesome blender and cheaper than even costco. I bought the wildside jar for 110 on amazon. so got blender and 3 jars for 300 and that is about what it is at costco with one jar and sometimes has the deal with 2 jars. It blends great makes smoothies awesome auto shutoff digital timer and so on. The cheap blenders just cannot compare and with 8 year warranty you will go through 3-4 for 50 dollar blenders before this one goes out.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Musich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and durable blender
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender. I’ve have it for about two years now and have used it to make smoothies, creamed soups, green juices, simmering sauces and pistous. So far it’s still working as it did on day one. Best blender I’ve had to date. Also, I see that I’m being asked to rate the noise level; I’d say that it’s just as loud as any blender I’ve ever owned- not more, not less.
customer_reviews.author: Annabella A. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Blendtec truly stands behind their product and apart from a small hiccup, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item refurbished. I used it once and it started showing an overload error. I tried all the troubleshooting steps before calling customer service and the customer service made up for all the trouble! The customer service at blendtec is great and they truly stand behind their product. They paid for me to ship the broken base and shipped a new base free of charge. They also re-started by 8 year warranty when I told them I bought it refurbished. It has been about 3 months and I love it! I make hot soup, cold soup, sauces, acai bowls and smoothies with this. It is a truly forever appliance with the customer service to back it up!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Not built to work at all.  Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok the first day. My son opened it up and made some Bloody Marys etc. On the second day I tried to use it to make some liverwurst, not everyone’s favorite, I know. After just a few minutes under a load, it started smoking. I sent it back this morning. If you want an expensive blender for show, this ones for you. If you want a machine you can use and rely on, it’s definitely not. I had to go borrow my mom’s 60 year old, no kidding, Oster to bail me out in the middle of a messy project.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, Fast speed. Blade and internal parts are steel.....not plastic like the Ninja brand which falls apart in 2 years. A real workhorse of a blender.....great price and came with a 8 year warranty. Much cheaper and equally built as the higher priced Vitamix brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Mirch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this to replace a lost blender. I used it almost daily for 6 months before the motor burned out. The motor burned out partly because the soup I was making was thicker than normal (think masked potatoes thick). However, customer service replaced the base unit under warranty with no hassles and conscientious service. I was amazed to find this quality of customer service in today's consumer market. I highly recommend both the blender and the customer service. Th noise level is loud -- it IS a blender.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Brand New, Works excellently
customer_reviews.text: This blender comes straight from the manufacturer and is brand new, with the 8 year warranty. The price was quite low (under 200) so I bought this one to get my foot in the Blendtec door (they are the best blenders on the market). I will buy a larger wildside jar later, but I am perfectly pleased with this little beauty. It blends like you hope it will.
customer_reviews.author: Kiddo

customer_reviews.title: Defective when received
customer_reviews.text: Ran for less than two seconds then dead as roadkill. Don't bother. On web found multiple other folks had same issue. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Dargriff

customer_reviews.title: Smooth green smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: You want a very smooth smoothie this is the machine for you! I blend green smoothies with no hint of fiber taste. The fiber is there. If u let it sit in fridge it still rises to the top but when you drink it you can’t tast any chunks. I need to buy the bigger pitcher as well. Only thing is I wish they had a glass pitcher option.
customer_reviews.author: Ki

customer_reviews.title: Overload error- Broken after two uses.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a previous blendtec for 10 years. It finally gave out. This one lasted 2 days. Overload message and it won't blend any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rabin

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn out a lot of blenders in my time and then a friend recommended this one. Wow. It's truly amazing. We use it for everything from grinding rice flour and pulverizing nuts to turning whole fruits and vegetables into juice, smoothies and even making soft serve ice cream. It's super-easy to clean and unlike the Ninja (our last blender) there aren't a million nooks and crannies for food to get lodged in. Also unlike the Ninja there aren't multiple razor sharp blades to nick you when you clean it. As well as this is constructed I think it's going to be a long time before I wear this one out. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Fouts

customer_reviews.title: Yes it blends that
customer_reviews.text: I have made several smoothies, made ice cream from frozen bananas, cashew cheese sauces, chopped up cashews for vegan Parmesan cheese, among a few things. This blender is fantastic and cuts throw frozen fruit like butter. Smoothies are in fact smooth with no lumps. We needed a blender for our plant based diet and this thing is amazing. It's easy to clean and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Decided on this one due to made in USA and other reviews. Even though we put only 3-4 frozen strawberries to make a morning smoothie it doesn't break them up using the smoothie button. Have to use the manual button. Product does seem very solid and well made. Easy to register. 8year top to bottom warranty... don't see that with other products. I'd still buy it again. Chops nuts up great too!!!
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: Broke the 2nd time used. Piece of junk! It just stopped and never turned back on.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice blender but it doesn't chop as well as I ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice blender but it doesn't chop as well as I would have expected. Like many others if you do not have enough liquid, it will not go anywhere. I like my NInja better.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Meide

customer_reviews.title: A good blender
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got this blender. Love it. Made about 20+ smoothies in it. The first few I used the smoothie button found they seemed bubbly. Not a fan of that. Thought maybe was using to much water. Started using the ice cream button and having much better luck. I enjoy a thicker smoothie. One that needs a spoon. I love the fact that it has the different buttons. Takes the guess work out of knowing how long to blend things. It is so loud though that I have to cover my ears. Also have all my windows closed so I don't feel like I will disturb my neighbors. :)
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Best blender yet!
customer_reviews.text: This blender is great. We make smoothies every day. I like that there is a different blending for a variety of blender choices and that it stops when it is finished a particular cycle. It is not terrible noisy, but what blender isn't noisy?? It is very easy to clean and I also like the idea that the blades are NOT sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Pitcher Gets Stuck
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I give a 3 star rating is because the pitcher blade gets stuck. I have needed to replace it once already and need to replace it again. Pitcher blade rotates very hard and makes the motor screech. Otherwise it is a great blender, especially since I had a gadget made to help mix smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: We have been using this daily and love it! We are making healthy smoothies and delicious ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this daily and love it! We are making healthy smoothies and delicious soups. I bought one for my father in law who now has to have his food puree due to his illness. He has since gained back some weight and is a lot healthier. He has been a lot happier because he can still have a tasty meal and get the nutrients that he needs. I highly recommend this for those that have aging parents with ailments that hinder their ability to eat solid foods.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: Going strong for nearly 4 years
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent purchase. We've run this a couple thousand time (there's a counter on the display) and never had a problem. We've made everything with it and we most often use it for difficult-to-blend frozen items. Almost four years of excellent service in our kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Lerch, Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! And just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a good blender in my life(until now)! I love to make whole juices and smoothies and living in Florida, the fruit and veggie selections are endless. I started by doing some research, which narrowed the field down to two blenders - the Blentec and the Vitamix. Both have great reviews and both are considered top of the line. My choice to purchase the Blendtec blender over the Vitamix was made based on three things; the size of the blender as it is short enough to sit on the kitchen counter, the overall appearance of the unit, and the accessories, especially the twister jar! It has quickly become a regularly used piece of equipment in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Taoist

customer_reviews.title: blend 'er done
customer_reviews.text: There are two possible approaches for a blendtec review. one is to compare it to virtually all other blenders. The other is to compare it with one very particular blender. As far as all others: The high speed blender category is a paradigm shift. This isn't a toy to make frozen drinks once a year. This is an investment in your health and a real tool in the kitchen. It delivers consistent results, every time.Buy this to make your green drinks, etc. As far as the one rival: That is a good product too. The basic difference is that the blendtec is shorter and does not have the 'tamper'. I give the slight edge to this product.
customer_reviews.author: cody webb

customer_reviews.title: Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: The blender did not come with clear instructions. The power of the blender makes it necessary to hold it down so it doesn't bounce across the counter. I am only moderately pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: MazFam

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite Kitchen Appliances.
customer_reviews.text: I find this product to be sturdy, reliable and effective. I love my smoothies and use it now more than any other appliance in my kitchen pretty much. It blends all my ingredients with almost ZERO problems including Ice which I frequently add to my smoothie. I haven't had a Vitamix but it was more affordable at the time and I love how accessible and easy it is to use. It doesn't take up too much space in my tiny condo and is very diverse in its function.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The last blender you’ll need!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best blender ever. My parents have the Ninja but my wife and I got this one instead. Way easier to clean and the press the button, walk away aspect of it is amazing. No need to hover around waiting for it to finish. I also love how easy it is to use and requires basically no instructions. Tons of power, a bit noisy, but that’s to be expected when you have a strong motor.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best blender ever
customer_reviews.text: I use this blender every day for my smoothies. I can't eat regular food and on moat days I'm on a liquid diet and I can make a smoothie or soup in just a few minutes. Clean up is a breeze! I just add some warm water and a few drops of dish soap and then buzz it again for another 20 seconds. Easily the best purchase I have made and even told my doctor about it for other patients that have my rare stomach disorder. I would recommend this blender to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: wadma

customer_reviews.title: An awesome blender!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this blender literally pulverizes ingredients. I use dates in my morning smoothies and don't need to cut them into tiny pieces first, like I did with my Nutribullet. This blender makes the smoothest, creamiest smoothies, whether you use powdered greens or whole leaves, too. It seems to be high-quality materials - no flimsy plastic here. I highly recommend this blender for anyone who wants one that works as well as a Vitamix but doesn't have the budget for one. The only improvement I would make is including a smaller mixing jar for nuts, sauces, etc. This thing is WAY easier to clean than my NutriBullet is too.
customer_reviews.author: Travis W.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite kitchen appliance.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome -- we've had one for 2 years and the highest compliment that I can provide is that I just bought another for a gift for my sister. We make everything from smoothies, almond milk, banana 'ice cream' to a cashew cheese substitute in it. Haven't found anything,that's otherwise edible, that it can't blend. It's loud -- but, that said -- you can't expect it to blend everything and still be whisper quiet. It's a little louder than my coffee grinder -- but, given that it's only run for bursts, I'll take that all day long.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: I did want a Vitamix but there’s no way I could afford one. So I opted for a Blendtec and I’m very pleased with it even though it is a bit loud. I’ve made soup from scratch in it and it comes out piping hot. Mostly I use it for protein smoothies twice a day. Easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: avidreaderinwi

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Now I can throw out that horrible ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Now I can throw out that horrible Cuisinart glass blender food processor duo that doesn't actually blend anything and is too small to actually chop anything. This is not too loud and it blends smoothies into a wonder smooth consistency. I'm not clear on what each type of jar does but I'll keep using this until I find I need the wildside jar.
customer_reviews.author: yoyosmo74

customer_reviews.title: Best blender and company
customer_reviews.text: It is 4/5/2019 today and I bought my blendtec blender in July 2012. I use it frequently for green smoothies and it has always done a great job and I've never had any problems with it. Well it died today while I was making a smoothie. I went to look up my order and saw that it had an 8 year warranty. They were awesome and didn't give me any trouble at all. I'm sending my base back and they are sending me a refurbished one as soon as they get notification that I dropped my base off at UPS. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Akeman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this blender 3 weeks ago and it's already broken. I only use it a couple of times a day to make smoothies. It keeps going into "overload". Blendtec Customer service was great in answering my questions but because it's right before Christmas, I won't be able to get a new blender for 2 weeks! Not good! They won't ship a new one out until I return the old one. I was told by many people that this was a great blender, so far, not so good. I'll see whenever I get a new one how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Rocca's Bakery & Confections

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, and It Can Blend Up a Broomstick, Too
customer_reviews.text: This blender is the best. Please be advised: They have many blenders, and the selection changes over time. I'm only talking about the ORIGINAL model.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Blendtec better than Ninja!!
customer_reviews.text: Blendertec replaced my old Kitchenaid blender. Huge difference! Also outperforms the Ninja my son has. This thing chews ice and spits it out!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use. Makes about 2 smoothies amounts at a time.
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than I thought but the perfect size for me. It’s like a standard sized blender. The noise is expected when it’s chopping up frozen fruit or ice. It has preprogrammed settings which at first I didn’t think I’d like but now love it. You can also use the pulse button for additional blending or as a manual setting. It blends kale and spinach perfectly without a trace as well as hemp, flax and chia seed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Kleman

customer_reviews.title: this was suppose to be reconditioned, but we used ...
customer_reviews.text: this was suppose to be reconditioned, but we used it for one and one half month's before the motor got so hot it started to smoking, thin tripped power strip..I think they never did anything to this unit.my wife was chopping almonds that were soaked the night before that killed it?
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jay Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Blended for two seconds and then shut down. Returned to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I didn’t buy a Vitamix!
customer_reviews.text: What’s there not to like?! The blunt edge blades & four-sided jar are indeed more sophisticated engineering approach. Bought a Mini Twister Jar, separately, as companion for nut butters, etc.. Will purchase a Wildside+ Jar soon. Example. The preprogrammed ‘Hit Soup’ button/function is terrific. Load Jar -> Press (single!) Button -> Wait 180sec. -> Eat. Tho, while everything is available online, of course; but, I’d wish the instructions were more, er, instructive for my particular model.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: An appliance worth having
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this blender on an almost daily basis for the past nine months and it has given excellent performance. It has been a dream making smoothies and soups (the puréed kind) and I am very happy that I bought it (it took me months of going back and forth, doing research, because of the cost, and I finally just went ahead and did it.) It is loud, but aren’t they all? I use noise canceling headsets with loud appliances anyway, so that isn’t a real problem. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: p.m.

customer_reviews.title: and it works great. I would say it is very comparable to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first quality blender, and it works great. I would say it is very comparable to the vitamix that my friend has, at least with the smoothies and food processing I've done with it. The one touch buttons are great too. I am a little concerned as after the 8th use, a portion of the lcd panel went out. It's not worth returning, and Blendtec did say they would replace it, but I don't want to go without a blender while I wait for the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fanatic fan of Blendtec
customer_reviews.text: If its possible to have a close relationship with your blender, I have it with this Blendtec. After having tried the Ninja and my mother's Vitamix, I was looking for something with enough power to really make a creamy green smoothie without taking over my kitchen. The Blendtec tackles everything I've ever given it and is easy to clean and maintain, and takes up only a small portion of my counter top. I hear the concerns about the jar not being glass, and the plastic definitely corrodes over time, but I think I prefer the lightness and durability of the plastic. I definitely land on the Blendtec side of blender wars!
customer_reviews.author: Terasa Cooley

customer_reviews.title: A great blender
customer_reviews.text: This is my first blender and I'm surprised by its power. The noise is a bit loud but you can feel its power. A highlight is definitely the safe design on the blade and super easy to clean. Absolutely 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Fujiang

customer_reviews.title: Won’t blend anything that requires a frozen texture
customer_reviews.text: This blender HATES anything that requires ice like smoothies or Frappuccinos! I own a bakery/cafe and bought two of these blenders...they WILL NOT blend without turning them off repeatedly and jostling them to move the slushy liquid free! Thumbs down!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Colarossi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much as advertised
customer_reviews.text: So far I have just used the blender to make smoothies. Does an amazing job. The blender is so powerful you literally need to hold the base when it starts up. Very easy to clean. I bought a second one for our Mountain home.
customer_reviews.author: David Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blender
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had this long, but my brother and my parents own the same blender and have loved them. I have used my parents frequently and have been wanting one. Got this on Black Friday and have no complaints or regrets. Powerful and durable blender!
customer_reviews.author: mebeh

customer_reviews.title: Seal leaks and smells bad.
customer_reviews.text: While it does do the thing it was supposed to do: blend things, it smells bad doing it. the seal at the base of the jar leaks and now smells like used underwear after.
customer_reviews.author: preston hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blender we’ve ever owned, we’ve owned a vita mix, ninja, cheap ones from the stores, somewhat expensive ones from the store, they are alright but we prefer the blend tec to any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does it all, for less than the other one
customer_reviews.text: Wanted the expensive one, glad we found this on sale. Makes great hummus and smoothies, easier to clean than our old blender, lots of power. Electronic interface is a little weird, but just takes some time to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for about a year now. It has worked flawlessly -- 680 cycles so far. I use this blender mostly for making fruit and vegetable juice from whole foods. It took me a little while to get the hang of cutting things up a little so that everything would blend on it's own. For example, anything round needs to be cut in half. Also, when making juice, the liquid will get warm, so I always throw in two ice cubes, or use a little frozen fruit, to keep the mix cool.
customer_reviews.author: JKM

customer_reviews.title: Nutrition is key for good health!
customer_reviews.text: This is the sixth blend Tec I have purchased I have used mine for 13 years Still works as well as the first time I used it. I have purchased 4 more for my kids and 1 for my sister when she was diagnosed with colon cancer! I couldn’t survive with out mine. I gave a green smoothie every day!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Using this 2-3 times a day for first month- so far we love it. Noise level is not obnoxious- it’s a blender after all. Love the way it blends with the four sided jar. Glad I took the leap to a high speed blender- worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth in NC

customer_reviews.title: Blends stuff like a banshee!
customer_reviews.text: holy! this thing blends anything! I am surprised just how great this super blends anything I throw at it! I use it for green smoothies and no way you would get the smooth fully blended final result with another blender! plus a great warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Vinyl Friend

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This blender is the "Best Ever" that I have used in over 50 years. I love it, and highly recommend it to anyone who wants to make healthy frozen drinks at home. Worth every penny believe me!
customer_reviews.author: essolunapapa

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing I read all the reviews here. I was a little apprehensive because of the price but decided to try it. I was not disappointed! We make healthy "Zone" smoothies every day and this machine makes the smoothest smoothie around! No lumps of ice or friut or nuts...just smooth, healthy goodness. I can't wait to try making some cream soups come the fall. Another BIG bonus for me was that it fits on my counter under the cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: coramdayo

customer_reviews.title: Blends beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Just used it and so pleased! All frozen pieces of fruit were blended in which is why I was looking for another blender. So happy! Oh and it fits under the cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Martinsen

customer_reviews.title: Will hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Hate the lid. Extremely hard to put on. Unit has never been anything but hand washed so don't know how the container shrunk or the lid grew.
customer_reviews.author: Wm.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Will it blend? Heck yes it will! I love this thing. It blends exceptionally well and is super easy to clean because the blades are blunt. It's super loud though! You may want to hold the base if you're blending a lot of solid objects because it shakes a lot...BUT BOY DOES IT BLEND!!!!
customer_reviews.author: godshippy

customer_reviews.title: Burned down after first use! Don’t buy it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just used it once to do a smoothie and the motor started producing a lot of smoke. The motor burned down!!!! Don’t buy it. I can’t believe I just threw down the drain $250!
customer_reviews.author: Macarena

customer_reviews.title: You'll never want to order a different blender ever...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Blendtec. I make smoothies and protein shakes every day with no problems at all. Still trying to figure out the perfect measurements to make an ice cream shake, but besides that it's perfect. Very easy to clean. It's pretty loud but that doesn't bother me because of the quality of my shakes/smoothies. Highly recommend this product! Investing in an awesome blender has been life changing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda O.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good experience and sound machine. A little overt priced.
customer_reviews.text: Is a good blender. Its super loud and had long blend times. Things tend to get very frothy which I dont like. But it still does the trick. I wouldn't pay more than $150 if I had the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sudan

customer_reviews.title: This is it!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of Blenders from Oster, to Ninja, to Vitamix....nothing compares to the power and simplicity of Blendtec. I'm in love. I use mine everyday with out fail.
customer_reviews.author: Corinthian

product_meta.title: Blendtec Total Classic Countertop Blender, 75 oz, FourSide Jar Black
product_meta.description:
Color:FourSide Jar Black| Style:Blender

Let’s talk about time for a moment, it’s the one thing in life that is given equally to everyone. Regardless of our circumstances, jobs, or family commitments we all have exactly 24 hours to use each day. Time is precious and fleeting. It will not wait for any of us to use it up or share with others.

Cooking meals and cleaning dishes takes effort and a lot of time. Day-after-day meals need to be made, and then the cleanup begins. It’s a necessary part of life. Blendtec blenders significantly reduce meal prep time and cleanup. When you buy a Blendtec blender you’re not only buying the world’s most advanced blender, you’re also buying yourself more time.

How can a blender give you more time? It comes down to technology and design.

Our advanced technology and jar design create a vortex, which pulls food towards the blade instead of pushing it to the sides of the jar like our competitors. With Blendtec jars, you won’t waste time tending your blends with a tamper to get all the ingredients down into the blades, and no tamper means one less thing to clean when you’re done.

Blendtec blenders can also heat your food during the blend cycle. For instance, if you want soup for dinner, a Blendtec blender can blend it up and heat it up at the same time so it’s ready to serve straight from the blender jar. No need to heat your soup in a pan. Can your old blender do that? No pan and no additional heating time means less cleanup.

Not only can Blendtec blenders heat your food, they can also make ice cream. Actual ice cream can be made with the exact same blender that makes soup.

Drinks, appetizers, main courses, and desserts can all be made with the same blender using the same jar. The time it takes to make each course could be measured in seconds not minutes or hours. Cleanup for an entire multi-course meal could be as simple as pushing the pre-programmed, self-cleaning button to wash a single jar, and just like that, you’ll be done.

There is a reason that having the world's most technologically advanced blender is worth every penny, it gives you more time to focus on life and the people who matter to you.

Illuminated LCD timer displays remaining time on blends.10 incremental speeds + Pulse
feature_bullets: Easy blending cycles: 1-touch buttons, 6 pre-programmed cycles, pulse, and 10 speed manual control with the ability to achieve a variety of textures. Complete control to adjust your blending at any time while blending

Patented blade/80% thicker: stainless-steel forged blade, with wings, for amazingly smooth blends (10x stronger than other blender blades). note: Blade is not sharp, blade is dull. No more cuts and pokes. Self-cleaning: add a little soap and water, your jar can clean itself in less than 1 minute
Large batches: BPA-free four-sided jar is a 75 ounce volume jar with 32 ounce blending capacity (wet or dry) ideal for blending beverages for 3-4 people

Warming Soup: Blendtec blenders heat soups and drinks through blade friction heat. Enjoy a warm meal or beverage in 6 minutes or less. Electrical ratings: Volts 120, Watt 1560, Hz 50-60, amp 13, cord: feet 35inches/3 feet
8 year warranty/American Company: Family-owned and driven to build the best quality products - without compromise. Engineered and assembled in the USA.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,037 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
